thread.title: Ex Chelsea boss Carlo Ancelotti gets acting role in new Star Trek
thread.title_full: Ex Chelsea boss Carlo Ancelotti gets acting role in new Star Trek

author: paulmbanks
title: Ex Chelsea boss Carlo Ancelotti gets acting role in new Star Trek
text:
Tweet 
Former Chelsea Manager Carlo Ancelotti has been linked to all the big clubs whenever there’s been a vacancy or potential vacancy- Manchester United, Manchester City, Liverpool, even Chelsea again. Of course, none of these Ancelotti rumors have ever amounted to anything. 
Although the former leader at Real Madrid and Paris Saint Germain has expressed a desire to return to England; and soon. 
In the meantime, Carlo Ancelotti has a budding acting career to focus on. No, that previous sentence is not a typo. According to La Gazzetta , Ancelotti landed a small acting role in the newest edition of the Star Trek film franchise. 
He’ll play a doctor in the Federations Starfleet! Seems totally out of left field that this all came about, but I guess Carlo Ancelotti has a great agent! It’s Hollywood, and it’s all about who you know. Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous television and radio talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
